Faguó / Faguó rén: (Wǒ) hěn hǎo xìng rèn shi nǐ.
Wǒ men qù chí fàn ba!

France / French: I am leaving. / I need to go.
Are you done? Are you ready?

Faguó / Faguó rén: Wǒ shi xuéshēng. Wǒ bú shi lǎoshī.
France / French: I am a student. I am not a teacher.

Faguó / Faguó rén: Wǒ shi xuéshēng, bú shì lǎoshī.
France / French: I am a student, not a teacher.
We all do not have books.
I have two cups of tea.

Faguó / Faguó rén: Ni yào chá ma? = Ni yào bú yào chá?
Nǐ huì yóuyǒng ma? = Nǐ huì bú huì yóuyǒng?

France / French: We all do not like him.

Faguó / Faguó rén: Tāmen bù dōu shì Yìnní rén.
Tāmen dōu bú shì Yìnní rén.

France / French: I like to eat bun very much.
I do not like to eat bun.

Faguó / Faguó rén: Wǒ bbù tài xǐhuān chī bāozi.
France / French: I do not like to eat bun very much.

Faguó / Faguó rén: Nǐ tàitài xǐhuān h1e chá ma?
France / French: Does your wife like to drink tea?

Faguó / Faguó rén: Nǐ xiānshēng xǐhuān kàn diànyǐng ma?
France / French: Does your husband like to go to a movie?

Faguó / Faguó rén: Nǐ gěi wǒ nǐde hào mā?
Yì bēi nǎichá jǐ kuài qián?
France / French: How much is a cup of milk tea?

Faguó / Faguó rén: Wǒ de péng yǒu de shǒu jī

France / French: He is eating a bread right now.
Will you go to night market (with me)?
Where did she buy the water?
I went to a night market to buy clothes.

Faguó / Faguó rén: Wǒ zuótiān zài yèshì mǎi yīfú.
France / French: I went to a night market to buy clothes yesterday.

Faguó / Faguó rén: Wǒ yào qù yèshì mǎi yīfú.
France / French: I want to go to a night market to buy clothes.

Faguó / Faguó rén: Wǒ míngtiān yào qù yèshì mǎi yīfú.
France / French: I will go to a night market to buy clothes tomorrow.
We are all in the classroom.

Faguó / Faguó rén: Shuǐ kāfēi hé chá wǒ dōu xǐhuān.
France / French: Water, coffee and tea, I like them all.

Faguó / Faguó rén: Wǒ xǐhuān chá, kěshì bùxǐhuān píjiǔ.
France / French: I like tea but not beer.
He is busy but not tired.

Faguó / Faguó rén: Tā hěn kě, kěshì bú è.
France / French: He is thirsty but not hungry.

Faguó / Faguó rén: Nǐ xǐhuān chē shuǐ hái chá?
France / French: Do you like to dink water or tea?

Faguó / Faguó rén: Wǒ yaò kāfēi huò shì chá.

France / French: The weather is very good today.

Faguó / Faguó rén: Něi liàng chē shì Déguó chē?
France / French: Which car is a German car?

Faguó / Faguó rén: Tā mǎi le hěn duō shuǐguǒ.
Tā Jīntiān maǐ le hěn duō shuǐguǒ.

France / French: This cell phone is too expensive.

Faguó / Faguó rén: Zhèi shuāng tàixiǎo, wǒ yào dà yidiǎn de.
France / French: This pair is too small, I want a bigger  one.

Faguó / Faguó rén: Nèi jiàn tài duǎn, chang yìdiǎn.
France / French: That one is too short, longer.
That pen is good to write.
Beef noodles are tasty.(good to eat)
Which kind of things are disgusting?

Faguó / Faguó rén: Yìzhī bǐ, liǎngběn shū, yígòng duōshǎo qián?
France / French: A pen, two books, altogether how much are they?
